definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond

sentences.english: There must be a hole somewhere, I can hear the water slopping about in the bottom of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 一定是哪兒有個洞，我聽得見水在船底流蕩的聲音。

sentences.english: Let Thy goodness, like a fetter, Bind my wandering heart to Thee.
sentences.chinese: 我主，讓此恩典維繫流蕩的心歸你前。

sentences.english: The wandering clouds have gathered at the edge of the sky on yonder rise of the land.
sentences.chinese: 流蕩的雲片聚集在遠野高地的天邊。
